title: 019: Gym Idiots
description: Almost every gym has a few ignoramuses and self-absorbed pricks who totally disregard common courtesy and gym etiquette. In this episode, Sal, Justin and Adam call these jokers and their selfish behavior out. Oh, and by the way, if you are one of these people, stop being a dick.
